get_met_bins¶

cosmerge.utils.get_met_bins(mets)¶

Returns the bin edges for metallicity bins centered on supplied metallicities assuming a log_10 spaced metallicity grid

Parameters
metsnumpy.array

centers of metallicity bins

Returns
met_binsnumpy.array

metallicity bin edges
